properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

Spacious four bedroom detached home located on a quiet residential road close to local parks and highly regarded schools. The ground floor offers a large entrance hall, two reception rooms, a modern fitted kitchen with island, dining area and integrated appliances, plus a downstairs WC. Upstairs features four well-proportioned bedrooms, including a master with en-suite, and a contemporary family bathroom. The property further benefits from off-street parking, a garage and a landscaped rear garden.

Well-presented one bedroom apartment situated on the second floor of a modern development within walking distance of the town centre and mainline station. The property comprises an open-plan kitchen/living area with fitted appliances, a double bedroom with built-in storage and a stylish bathroom suite. Additional features include double glazing, secure entry system and allocated parking.

Charming three bedroom mid-terrace period property offering character features throughout, including fireplaces and high ceilings. The ground floor consists of a front reception room, dining room and a fitted kitchen with access to the rear garden. Upstairs provides three bedrooms and a family bathroom. Ideally located close to transport links and local amenities.

Rarely available two bedroom detached bungalow positioned on a generous corner plot. The accommodation includes a spacious living room, fitted kitchen, two double bedrooms and a modern shower room. Externally the property boasts a wraparound garden, driveway parking and potential to extend (subject to planning permission).

Large three bedroom split-level apartment offering flexible living accommodation and excellent natural light throughout. The property features a spacious lounge with balcony, separate fitted kitchen, three bedrooms and a family bathroom. Located close to shops, caf√©s and excellent transport links into Central London.
